# <a name="print-an-attachment-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="57e19-102">Tlačiť prílohu v službe Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57e19-102">Print an attachment in Outlook.com</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="57e19-103">Otvorte správu, ktorá obsahuje prílohu, ktorú chcete vytlačiť.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57e19-103">Open the message that contains the attachment you want to print.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="57e19-104">Presuňte kurzor nad prílohu a vyberte ikonu **Ďalšie akcie**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57e19-104">Move your cursor over the attachment and select the **More actions** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="57e19-105">> **Stiahnuť**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57e19-105">> **Download**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="57e19-106">Po stiahnutí súboru, otvorte ho s príslušný program a vyberte možnosť tlač.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57e19-106">After the file has downloaded, open it with the appropriate program and choose the option to print.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="57e19-107">Napríklad, otvorte súbor s príponou .doc v programe Word a potom vytlačiť.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57e19-107">For example, open a .doc file in Word and then print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57e19-108">Pre viac informácií, prečítajte si [vytlačiť e-mailové správy, prílohy, a kalendárov v službe Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57e19-108">For more information, read [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
